Gordon -

You were correct, I totally missed the kogai/fuchi connection.
(Easy to do when you only have 6 functional brain cells, or is
it five???)

Seriously, I can't imagine the metal working skill to bend
a kogai around into a fuchi without damage; crimping the metal,
popping the inlay, etc. Is there any way you can post better
pics of the fuchi? I'd love to see more detail of the work.

Thanks
Rich S
